title: 神奇宝贝MOD怎么修改精灵体型？
author: superman123_
txt_content: 如题，请大佬帮忙解决问题

replies.author: A_Glitch
replies.txt_content: 对着精灵输入/nbtedit 找到Growth数值改成0-7

replies.author: superman123_
replies.txt_content:
A_Glitch 发表于 2016-12-22 17:00
对着精灵输入/nbtedit 找到Growth数值改成0-7
可以？！！！我还以为是修改体型的英文

replies.author: A_Glitch
replies.txt_content:
